TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. you are taken to In School Suspension.

I wish for more acronyms.

Granted. Every word is now a acronyms.

I wish for my wish to be rich to not be corrupted.

You get your riches. The world detonates, and you get vaporized, but your safe of riches floats through the world's debris fields.

I wish to not wish, but to wish a dream. My wish is to be able to work what I just said out.
Your wish... I DONT KNOW. GO AWAY.

Since Music penguin didn't post a wish, I just rigged him to explode whenever he starts up KSP.

I wish that security footage wasn't so boring.

Granted, but now you explode from sheer excitement from it.

I wish i for a donut c:

Edited September 13, 2013 by ThatDebri

Granted, now the donut turns into a living monster out to eat you!

I wish for a ksp to be a good game when it's finished!

Edited September 13, 2013 by DWARF

Granted. It's a horrible game until it's finished.

I wish to know what is love?

Granted, but you now know you will never love.

I wish for Rage to answer my wish

Granted. I do in a horribly vugular and accusational way.

I wish for 20, legitimate and safe dollars with no negative consequences for having them.

Granted, but there are only shops who take euro and there are no ATMs

I wish for Rage097 to ragequit.

Granted. I'm at your door with a gun.

I wish for people to stop making stale jokes.

Granted, now you die from lack of fun.

I wish for rockets to rock music.

granted, all the music gets rocked and destroyed in the process

I wish more people loved ksp

Granted, but now they all complain about the lack of realism.

I wish i had a better CPU.

Granted, but you end up getting a virus somehow...

I wish that i'd wouldn't have to keep coming up with wishes to put here...

Granted, but now the wishes you grant always backfire on you.

I wish for uncorrupt wishes.

Granted, but you can only wish for corrupt wishes. MWAHAHAHA!

I wish for less wishing and more science.

Granted, we only wish that you die and you get a 0.22 that adds more science but is full of bugs.

I wish to reentry.

Edited September 15, 2013 by Dart980

not granted, because you already are...

I wish for my prototypes to work..

Granted, but since they always work they aren't prototypes anymore.

I wish for faster than light travel.

Granted, but you make Albert Einstein cry in his sleep and Destroy the universe for reasons...

I wish Bronies could live peacefully without haters charging at us from every direction.

Granted, but it only lasts a week.

I wish my Kerbals weren't stuck on the Mun...

Granted, they are now stuck on Minmus.

I wish I vfbiwaidbvfrgakibpgepairuuuuuuuuikal

Granted, but you explode because your in space without a suit and didn't make your wish clear...

I Wish for kerbal space program to be bad (yeah, i want you to corrupt it to make it what i actually want it to be )
